short_summary: Supply and installation of racking materials at new GCSurplus Warehouse
duration_in_months: She was going to be gone for 3 months!
full_summary:
================
### Tender for Industrial Racking Supplies for GCSurplus Warehouse

#### Tender Reference
WS4108751181 - ESP00139607

#### Public notice date
August 31, 2023

#### Tender closing date
September 22, 2023 at 14:00 ( Eastern Time )

#### Background
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of GCSurplus, is seeking to procure the supply and installation of industrial racking materials for the new GCSurplus Warehouse located at 110 Damascus Road, Bedford, Nova Scotia.

#### Key Requirements
- Supply and installation of racking materials at the declared site
- Compliance with PWGSC's specifications and standards

#### Tender details
- Tender category: Goods
- Tender notice type: Request for Proposal
- Procurement method: Open bidding
- Selection criteria: Competitive pricing
- Trade agreements: In accordance with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other applicable agreements.

#### Contract Information
- Contracting authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
- Contact person: Brian Secord
- Contact details: brian.secord@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Related links
- Public notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17320603](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17320603)
- Tender documentation: Included in the public notice link
